reviewText: It's nice and what was expected
Excellent video, we are enjoying it right now. Highly recommend it

Although I like this drama, the quality of the DVDs are really bad.  It appears that they were copied.  They freeze up in many parts and some parts are missed because of this.  One of the DVD actually shows a news broadcast right in the middle of an episode.  Just horrible!!

Excellent casting, nice music and cinematography!
The actors/actresses are superb!  Directing is wonderful.
Very well made series and entertaining.  Highly recommended.
